title: Teen wonders play bluegrass
description: Brothers Jonny, Robbie and Tommy Mizzone are The Sleepy Man Banjo Boys, a trio of virtuoso bluegrass musicians who play with dazzling vivacity. Did we mention they're all under 16?
author: Sleepy Man Banjo Boys
keywords: TED, talks, children, entertainment, live music, performance, wunderkind, youth
